Package grafiosch.repository

Interface MailSendRecvJpaRepository

All Superinterfaces:
BaseRepositoryCustom<MailSendRecv>, org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<MailSendRecv,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<MailSendRecv,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<MailSendRecv,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<MailSendRecv,Integer>, MailSendRecvJpaRepositoryCustom, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<MailSendRecv,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<MailSendRecv>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<MailSendRecv,Integer>, UpdateCreateJpaRepository<MailSendRecv>
public interface MailSendRecvJpaRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<MailSendRecv,Integer>, MailSendRecvJpaRepositoryCustom, UpdateCreateJpaRepository<MailSendRecv>
JPA Repository for MailSendRecv entities. It includes methods for standard CRUD operations and custom queries for managing mail messages, including their read/delete status and group operations.

  • Method Details

    • findFirstByIdReplyToLocalOrderByIdMailSendRecv

      MailSendRecv findFirstByIdReplyToLocalOrderByIdMailSendRecv(Integer idReplyToLocal)

    • deleteByIdReplyToLocalAndIdUser

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) void deleteByIdReplyToLocalAndIdUser(Integer idReplyToLocal, Integer idUser)
      Deletes mail messages from the mail_send_recv table that belong to a specific conversation thread (identified by idReplyToLocal) and are directly associated with the specified user (idUser, either as sender 'S' or receiver 'R'). This method permanently removes the message records.
      Parameters:
      idReplyToLocal - The ID of the conversation thread from which messages will be deleted.
      idUser - The ID of the user whose messages (sent or received) within that thread will be deleted.

    • deleteByIdMailSendRecvAndIdUser

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) void deleteByIdMailSendRecvAndIdUser(Integer idMailSendRecv, Integer idUser)
      Deletes a specific mail message from the mail_send_recv table by its unique ID (idMailSendRecv), but only if it was either sent by ('S') or received by ('R') the specified user (idUser). This acts as an ownership check before deletion. This method permanently removes the message record.
      Parameters:
      idMailSendRecv - The unique ID of the mail message to be deleted.
      idUser - The ID of the user who must be either the sender or receiver of the message.

    • findByUserOrGroup

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<MailSendRecvDTO> findByUserOrGroup(Integer idUser)
      Retrieves a list of mail messages as MailSendRecvDTO objects for a given user (idUser). This query aggregates messages directly addressed to/from the user and messages related to the user's roles, considering message timestamps against role modification times. It also joins with mail_send_recv_read_del to include read status and filters out messages marked as hidden or deleted by the user. The results are ordered by message ID.
      Parameters:
      idUser - The ID of the user whose messages are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of MailSendRecvDTO objects representing the user's messages.

    • countRoleSend

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<MailSendRecvJpaRepository.CountRoleSend> countRoleSend(Integer idUser)
      Counts the number of sent replies (send_recv = "S") within conversation threads (grouped by id_reply_to_local) that were initiated by a role message received by the specified user (idUser). This helps in determining activity or unread replies in role-based discussions relevant to the user.
      Parameters:
      idUser - The ID of the user for whom to count replies in their role-based conversations.
      Returns:
      A list of MailSendRecvJpaRepository.CountRoleSend projections, where each entry contains an idReplyToLocal (conversation thread ID) and numberOfAnswer (the count of sent replies in that thread).
